fieldUpdates.name: Sales Notification Checked

fieldUpdates.description: Sales Notification Date update
fieldUpdates.name: Sales Notification Date

fieldUpdates.description: Set Welcome Call Follow Up Date field to +5 business days from today. NOTE: That data field that can also be edited manually when needed.
fieldUpdates.formula: TODAY() + 5 + CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900 , 1 , 7 ) , 7 ) , 0 /* TODAY is Sunday */ , 0 /* All weekdays */ , 1 /* TODAY is Monday */ , 2 /* Spans a weekend */ , 2 /* TODAY is Tuesday */ , 2 /* Spans a weekend */ , 3 /* TODAY is Wednesday */ , 2 /* Spans a weekend */ , 4 /* TODAY is Thursday */ , 2 /* Spans a weekend */ , 5 /* TODAY is Friday */ , 2 /* Spans a weekend */ , 6 /* TODAY is Saturday */ , 1 /* Skip past Sunday */ , NULL )
fieldUpdates.name: Welcome Call Follow Up +5 Business Days

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Current Step via Version Rollup update - Client Canceled
rules.description: This workflow will look for the Order Current Steps via Version Rollup value to be < zero. When this occurs, the HRE: Current Step Client Cancel Ref Obj field update will be executed.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support HR Solutions Ref Object") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support PEO Ref Object") ) && (Order_Current_Steps_via_Version_Rollup__c < 0) && (NOT(ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(Order_Current_Steps_via_Version_Rollup__c))))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Current Step via Version Rollup update - Completed
rules.description: This workflow will look for the Order Current Steps via Version Rollup value to be zero, EXCEPT when the record is initially created. When this occurs, the HBK: Current Step Completed Ref Obj field update will be called.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support HR Solutions Ref Object") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support PEO Ref Object") ) && (NOT(ISNEW())) && (NOT(TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Current_Step__c))="New")) && (Order_Current_Steps_via_Version_Rollup__c = 0) && (Number_of_Multiple_Versions__c > 0)

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Current Step via Version Rollup update - In Progress
rules.description: This workflow will look for the Order Current Steps via Version Rollup value to be greater than zero. When this occurs, the HBK: Current Step In Progress Ref Obj field update will be executed.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support HR Solutions Ref Object") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support PEO Ref Object") ) && (Order_Current_Steps_via_Version_Rollup__c > 0)

rules.description: This rule sends the Welcome Email to the client with notification of their assigned advisor. This rule also notifies the sales representative that the client has been assigned out.

rules.fullName: HRE Client At Risk Email to Sales
HRE Remove Client Saved On Date
rules.description: This will remove old data in the Client Saved On field if a client was previously saved but later wants to cancel.

rules.fullName: HRE%3A AC Reminder email HRE - Support
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 and (7 or 8)
rules.description: This sends the AC HRE reminder email to a client, but uses the Approval Copy to Client field, NOT the Approval Copy to Client Date field.

criteriaItems.value: Reference HRE/CHB Onboarding,Handbook Support HRE/CHB Ref Object

rules.description: sent to HRE Clients once Date in Cancellation Package Sent is entered

rules.fullName: HRE%3A Confirmation of Appointment - CHB Email
rules.description: When Interview Scheduled is checked and Product Type = CHB, send Welcome Call Follow-up email and attachments to CHB Clients

rules.fullName: HRE%3A Confirmation of Appointment - HRE Email

criteriaItems.value: CHB,CHB – Think HR,EMS,EMS – ThinkHR,HRE,HRE 2.0,HRE – Dedicated,HRE – Support

rules.description: When Interview Scheduled is checked and Product Type = HRE, send Welcome Call Follow-up email to HRE Clients
When Contract Clean is checked, update Contract Clean Date with the current date

rules.fullName: HRE%3A First Call Resolution for Support
rules.description: Update the Current Step field to Complete for non-Handbook update Support case without requiring any Follow Up

rules.fullName: HRE%3A Follow Up Completed for Support
rules.description: Update the Current Step field to Resolved for non-Handbook update Support case.

rules.fullName: HRE%3A Follow Up Needed for Support
rules.description: Update the Current Step field to Follow Up Needed for non-Handbook update Support case

criteriaItems.value: Reference HRE/CHB Onboarding,Handbook Support HRE/CHB Ref Object,Service Support HRE/CHB Ref Object

rules.description: When Workflow Helper Client Canceled is True and Canceled Date is blank, set Current Step to Client Cancel Started.

rules.fullName: HRE%3A Handbook Client Cancel Started - Notification to Sales
rules.description: When the Client Cancel process has started, send email with client details to Sales Rep, FSS and DSM
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Reference HRE/CHB Onboarding") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support HRE/CHB Ref Object") || (RecordType.Name = "Service Support HRE/CHB Ref Object") ) && not(ISNULL(Cancel_Requested_On__c)) && ( Cancel_Requested_On__c <= Charge_Back_Date__c ) && (not(ISPICKVAL( Handbook_Lost_Reason__c ,''))) && ( No_Email_Needed__c = FALSE)

criteriaItems.value: Reference HRE/CHB Onboarding,Handbook Support HRE/CHB Ref Object,Service Support HRE/CHB Ref Object

rules.description: When Workflow Helper Client Canceled is True and Canceled Date is NOT blank, set Current Step to Client Canceled.
When Interview Completed is checked, update Interview Completed Date with the current date

rules.fullName: HRE%3A Onboarding Auto HRE Welcome Email

rules.description: When Workflow Helper Client Canceled is True and Canceled Date is blank, set Current Step to Client Cancel Started.
When Workflow Helper Client Canceled is True and Canceled Date is NOT blank, set Current Step to Client Canceled.
When all versions printed is true, set Current Step to Onboarding Complete
When Contract Received Date is populated and Contract Clean is NOT checked, set Current Step to (1 of 8) Contract Received
When Contract Clean is checked and Set Up Complete is NOT checked, set Current Step to (2 of 8) Contract Clean
When Set Up Complete is checked, and Welcome Call Complete and Interview Scheduled are NOT checked, set Current Step to (3 of 8) Set-up Complete

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 and 7
rules.description: When Interview Scheduled and Welcome Call Complete are checked, and Interview Completed is NOT checked, set Current Step to (4 of 8) Welcome Call Complete/Interview Scheduled

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 and 7 and 8
rules.description: When HDW Sent and Welcome Call Complete are checked, and Interview Completed is NOT checked, set Current Step to (4 of 8) Welcome Call Complete/HDW Sent

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 and 7 and 8
rules.description: When HDW Sent is checked and Welcome Call Complete is not checked, and Interview Completed is NOT checked, set Current Step to (4 of 8) HDW Sent

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6 AND 7
rules.description: When Welcome Call Complete is checked but Interview Scheduled is NOT checked, set Current Step to (4 of 8) Welcome Call Complete

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6 AND 7
rules.description: When Interview Scheduled is checked and Welcome Call Complete is not checked, and Interview Completed is NOT checked, set Current Step to (4 of 8) Interview Scheduled

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 and 5 and 6 AND not(4) AND 7
rules.description: When Interview Completed is checked, set Current Step to (5 of 8) Interview Complete

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 and 7

rules.description: When Approval Copy to Client is checked, set Current Step to (6 of 8) Approval Copy Sent
When Order Approval Copy via Version Rollup > 0, set Current Step to (6 of 8) Approval Copy Sent
When all approval copies have been finilized is true and all versions printed equals false, set Current Step to (7 of 8) Approval Copy Finalized
When Order Approval Copy via Version Rollup > 0, All approval copies have been finalized is true and all versions printed equals false, set Current Step to (7 of 8) Approval Copy Finalized.
This fills in the Proposed Cancel Date when the Lost reason is filled in for HRE
rules.formula: ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(Cancel_Requested_On__c) && OR(ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "HRE"), ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "HRE – Support"), ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "HRE – Dedicated"), ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "HRE 2.0"))

rules.description: When Set Up Complete is checked, update Set Up Complete Date with the current date
When Approval Copy to Client is checked during the Handbook Support process, set Current Step to (1 of 4) Approval Copy Sent
If AC Change Received is checked during the Handbook Support process, set Current Step to (2 of 4) Approval Copy Change Received
When All Approval Copies Approved is checked during the Handbook Support process, set Current Step to (3 of 4) Approval Copy Finalized
When All Versions printed is checked during the Handbook Support process, set Current Step to Completed.
When Welcome Call Complete is checked, update Welcome Call Complete Date with the current date

rules.fullName: HRE%3A Welcome Call Followup %2F No Handbook - HRE Email
rules.description: When No Handbook is checked and Product Type = HRE, send Welcome Call Follow-up email with attachments to HR Essentials Clients

rules.fullName: Missed Welcome Call Email Date Email
rules.formula:
AND ( RecordType.Name = "Reference HRE/CHB Onboarding",
ISPICKVAL (Product_Type__c , "HRE 2.0 – ThinkHR") ||ISPICKVAL (Product_Type__c , "HRE 2.0") ||ISPICKVAL (Product_Type__c , "HRE – ThinkHR ") ||ISPICKVAL (Product_Type__c , "HRE – Dedicated"),
ISCHANGED ( Missed_Welcome_Call_Email_Date__c ) )

rules.fullName: Next Quarterly Call Date plus 90 days

rules.description: This fills in the Proposed Cancel Date +3 days when Cancel Request On date is entered for EMS/CHB/EHB clients.
rules.formula: ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(Cancel_Requested_On__c) && OR(ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "EMS – ThinkHR"), ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "CHB – Think HR"), ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "CHB"), ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "EMS"), ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c, "EHB"))

( RecordTypeId = "01270000000ULST" || RecordTypeId = "01270000000UMSi") && ( ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "HRE – Dedicated") || ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "HRE 2.0") ) && ISCHANGED( Date_of_Last_Queue_Call__c )
